solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    /**--newline--         * 16 / 16 test cases passed--newline--         * Status: Accepted--newline--         * Runtime: 9 - 10 ms--newline--         *--newline--         * @param intervals--newline--         * @return--newline--         */--newline--    public int eraseOverlapIntervals(Interval[] intervals) {--newline--            Arrays.sort(intervals, new Comparator<Interval>() {--newline--                @Override--newline--                public int compare(Interval o1, Interval o2) {--newline--                    if (o1.end != o2.end) return o1.end - o2.end;  //first sort by end--newline--                    return o2.start - o1.start;  //second sort by start--newline--                }--newline--            });--newline--    --newline--            int end = Integer.MIN_VALUE;--newline--            int count = 0;--newline--            for (Interval interval : intervals) {--newline--                if (interval.start >= end) end = interval.end;--newline--                else count++;--newline--            }--newline--    --newline--            return count;--newline--        }--newline--    --newline--}
